== Kottappady (628039) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kottappady is a village in the [[Kothamangalam]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 2786 hectares and harbouring 3357 households with total population of 13512 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kothamangalam]] is at a distance of 10 km. Male population is 6710 and female population is 6802. Scheduled Caste Population is 1932 and Scheduled Tribes population is 83. Census Location Code of the village is 628039<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 11698 (86.57%)
* Literate male population: 5925 (88.3%)
* Literate female population: 5773 (84.87%)
